Hildegard Breiner si Vorarlberg, Austria, ebe ya na di ya nwụrụ anwụ duziri mkpọsa mgbochi nuklia megide Zwentendorf Nuclear Power Plant na 1970s.N'afọ 1978, pasent 85 nke ndị ntuli aka na Vorarlberg tụbara votu ha megide Zwentendorf, na-atụnye ọnụ ọgụgụ nke referendum mba
N'ọkara nke abụọ nke 1980, Hildegard Breiner rụrụ nnukwu ọrụ na mmegide ụlọ ọrụ nrụpụta nuklia Wackersdorf nke a ga-ewu na Wackersdorf na agbataobi Bavaria, Germany
N'afọ 2004, Hildegard Breiner nwetara ihe nrite mmeri nke ndụ n'ọdịnihu n'efu..
